message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $9500. This is an exceptional opportunity given its value to you, and I believe it represents a fair deal.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I would like to propose a price of $8200. I hope this aligns better with my budget.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and would like to propose a price of $8700 for the product. I believe this strikes a balance between our interests.
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $8500 for the product. I hope this offers a reasonable compromise.
Thank you for your latest proposal, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept a price of $8600 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects both our positions.
